003892BF.desc: Picking up {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c} grants you {c_number}[{SF_0}*100|x%|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}{SF_1}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_0} * {SF_2} * 100|%x|]{/c}.

C6E60718.Buff2_Description: You deal [{SF_0}*100|%|] increased damage from recently picking up {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c}.
